column1: Table 6-41:  Net CO2 Flux from Soil and Biomass C Stock Changes for Land Converted to Grassland (MMT C)

column2: + Does not exceed 0.05 MMT CO2 Eq.

Notes: Estimates after 2010 are based on NRI data from 2010 and therefore may not fully reflect changes occurring in the latter part of the time series. Totals may not sum due to independent rounding. Parentheses indicate net sequestration.
